channel.title: CaseStudies on Hugoplate
channel.description: Recent content in CaseStudies on Hugoplate

item.title: AWS ECS to AWS EKS migration
item.description: Overview A leading software development company was using a container-based infrastructure deployed with Gitlab-CI in Amazon ECS and CloudWatch for logs and monitoring.

item.title: AWS OpsWorks to AWS Fargate Migration
item.description: Introduction This case study highlights how Cloud Native Solutions successfully migrated for our customer its existing Django-based infrastructure managed by AWS Opsworks (Chef) to a containerized infrastructure on AWS Fargate.

item.title: Transition from Terraform + Ansible to Kubernetes
item.description: Overview Our client was using AWS infrastructure managed by Terraform and Ansible to deploy and maintain its applications.
